more.requirement: Cheerful and friendly looking / Ngọai hình ưa nhìn và thân thiện. 2. 1 year experience in similar position in restaurant or hotel, bar is an advantage / Kinh nghiệm 1 năm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương tại nhà hàng hoặc khách sạn, bar. 3. Able to communicate in English / Giao tiếp tiếng Anh cơ bản. 4. Positive attitude and team working spirit / Có thái độ tích cực và tinh thần tập thể. 5. Able to work night shift until 1am / Có thể làm đến 1 giờ khuya.
more.description: 1. Set and maintain par levels on all beverages. 2. Daily stock orders/requisitions. 3. Maintain equipment par level. Purchase equipment when required, with management authorization. 4. Fill out all stock transfers. 5. Fill out all spillage reports. 6. Responsible for daily cleaning of the bar. 7. Control all glassware, maintaining breakage reports, and liaise with the Stewarding Dept. to order more stock. 8. Ensure a thorough knowledge of the workings of your Department. 9. To understand and act on the duties pertaining to the opening of the bar. 10. To understand the correct method of taking an order and dispensing in the correct manner. 11. To implement correct portion control of beverage. 12. To have a practical working knowledge of all equipment within the bar. 13. To understand fundamental mixed drinks, cocktails and wines. 14. Conduct the correct procedures to secure the bar. 15. Monitor and understand production controls. 16. To follow the correct method of handling returned drinks. 17. Perform other duties as assigned by Supervisor / Manager.
